title: Rapping The News In West Africa
teaser: In Dakar, Senegal, two rappers going by the names Keyti and Xuman offer a summary of the week's news in hip-hop format.
contentencoded:
In Dakar, Senegal, two rappers going by the names Keyti and Xuman offer a summary of the week's news in hip-hop format. Journal Rapp√© is a short TV show distributed on YouTube with a huge following, especially in West Africa where a majority of the population is under 25.
